mapper.select: SELECT X.RNUM, X.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM,T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM POST WHERE BOARD_CODE=#{board_code} ORDER BY P_CREATION_DATE ASC) T ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endnum}) X WHERE X.RNUM >= #{startnum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{board_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( POST_CODE, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, P_CREATION_DATE, VIEW_NUM, RECOMMEND_NUM, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_CODE ) VALUES( #{post_code}, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{p_creation_date}, #{view_num}, #{recommend_num}, #{member_id}, #{board_code} )
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET VIEW_NUM=VIEW_NUM+1 WHERE POST_CODE=#{post_code}
UPDATE POST SET RECOMMEND_NUM = RECOMMEND_NUM+1 WHERE POST_CODE = #{post_code}
mapper.select: select p.post_code,p.POST_TITLE,to_char(p.POST_CONTENT) as post_content,p.P_CREATION_DATE,p.VIEW_NUM,p.RECOMMEND_NUM,p.MEMBER_ID,b.BOARD_NAME ,count(r.reply_code) as reply_count from post p, board b, reply r where p.board_code = b.board_code and p.post_code = r.post_code(+) group by p.POST_CODE,p.POST_TITLE,to_char(p.POST_CONTENT),p.P_CREATION_DATE,p.VIEW_NUM,p.RECOMMEND_NUM,p.MEMBER_ID,b.BOARD_NAME

select p.post_code,p.POST_TITLE,to_char(p.POST_CONTENT) as post_content,p.P_CREATION_DATE,p.VIEW_NUM,p.RECOMMEND_NUM,p.MEMBER_ID,b.BOARD_NAME ,count(r.reply_code) as reply_count, count(re.original_code) as report_count from post p, board b, reply r,report re where p.member_id = #{member_id} and p.board_code = b.board_code and p.post_code = r.post_code(+) and p.post_code = re.original_code(+) group by p.POST_CODE,p.POST_TITLE,to_char(p.POST_CONTENT),p.P_CREATION_DATE,p.VIEW_NUM,p.RECOMMEND_NUM,p.MEMBER_ID,b.BOARD_NAME
select post_code from post where post_code=#{post_code}
